text: Chinese restaurants are fantastic about offering discounts to regular customers. Find out how to ask for one in today’s Chinese dialogue.小明：老板，买单。经理：好的，您一共消费了300元。小明：老板，我经常来这里吃饭，您看能不能便宜一点儿？打个折。经理：那行，就给你打个九折，270元吧。以后常来。小明：好的，谢谢老板，您的店可以用支付宝吗？经理：支付宝、微信、现金都可以。小明：Boss, give me the bill!Manager：Ok, you’ve used 300 yuan.小明：Boss, I often eat here. Can you see about giving me a discount?Manager：Okay, I will give you a discount down to 270 yuan. Please come back often!小明：Thanks boss, does your place accept Alipay?Manager：Alipay, WeChat, and cash are all fine.1 – 打了几折？a. 八b. 九c. 六d. 七2 – 小明想用什么来买单？a. 支付宝b. 微信c. 刷卡d. 现金1. b2. aReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
